issue.title: [Python] Test the _exec_plan.filter_table helper with complex expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16468](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16468). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a comprehensive test suite for `_exec_plan.filter_table` with the primary purpose of testing its convenience and ease of use.

(PS: `pc.field` and `pc.scalar` shoul be used when building expressions, not `Expression._fied` etc..)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16468?focusedCommentId=17536021) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13099
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13099>
